name: Color Drag 2D (Re upload)
description:
Hey there!

Its Shurid here, This is a simple hypercasual game I created for BrainJam  March 2021 ,which was a Game Jam hosted by BRAIN STATION 23 . I really had fun making this game in this short time and I will continue working on it and will be adding a lot of features to it.

Hope you enjoy the game!

Assets Used

All in one shadder pack from Unity Store

PE2D particle pack from Unity Store

Hard Light Asset from Unity Store

Music/Sound Effects

Marvel83' - Lost Highway (Background Music)

AstroPop Game Sound Effects

Kenny Sound Pack
